content: *groovy grandma* is inspired by monica s granny square pillows on the iconic television show *friends* season 7 episode 3 *groovy grandma* is a crocheted pillow cover made up of 50 granny squares with 25 squares on each side which are joined together with the invisible seam method using a single row of single_crochet the two pieces are crocheted together the pillow form is inserted during the row of single_crochet for easy finishing yarn for each 50 square pillow 25 on each side sample made with berroco comfort worsted weight yarn 50% super fine nylon 50% super fine acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 210 yds 193m background color - approximately 160g worsted weight yarn colorway chalk multicolor rounds approximately 250g total worsted weight yarn colorways in sample 10 ballet pink rosebud agean sea blue angel lidfors goldenrod lavender frost aster jadeite adirondack crochet hook us size 6 4mm notions darning needle scissors 22 inch/56 cm square pillow form optional white cotton pillow covers gauge each granny square measures approximately 4 25in x 4 25 in/8cm x 8cm size pillow size - 22in x 22in 56cm x 56cm
